settings.title: Improve Strength
settings.content: Rich in CoQ10 and Creatine, nature's catalysts for muscular growth and power.

settings.title: Increase Stamina
settings.content: Contains Red & White Blood Cells and Heme Iron to support sustained oxygen delivery during exercise.

settings.title: Boost Energy
settings.content: Experience consistent energy reserves from key nutrients involved in the metabolic process, including Vitamin A, Choline, Riboflavin and Copper.

settings.title: Reduce Fatigue
settings.content: Rich in key nutrients including Anserine, Carnosine, and Taurine, which reduce muscle fatigue during workouts.

settings.title: Bioavailable Nutrients
settings.content: Highly bioavailable micronutrients from natural sources deliver superior absorption, maximizing nutrient utiilization for peak exercise performance.

IS THE EXERCISE PERFORMANCE STACK FOR ME?

For those pushing their limits at the gym or the track, this stack ensures you're fueled and ready for every rep,  run, and routine.

settings.quote: My energy has never been steadier, and my overall well being has never been better.
settings.author: Mike P.

settings.supporting_product_description: Lifeblood is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to improve iron stores, oxygen delivery, and endurance. Support a healthy cardiovascular system.
Bone Marrow & Liver is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to provide support for bone and tissue repair, skin health, and better mood.

settings.primary_product_description: Warrior is the foundational supplement included in the Exercise Performance Stack. It provides unique and essential support found in grass-fed and grass-finished heart and liver. These powerful organs include 12+ powerful nutrients to help reach your goals.

settings.title: CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is nature's richest source of CoQ10, a nutrient shown to improve mitochondrial function and energy production, and to enhance exercise performance.

settings.title: Anserine & Carnosine
settings.nutrient_description: Two amino acids which are effective in reducing muscle fatigue and improving antioxidant activity.

settings.title: Taurine
settings.nutrient_description: Improves muscle function and exercise performance through the reduction of reactive oxygen species. Is also a powerful antioxidant in muscle tissue and improves insulin sensitivity.

settings.title: Creatine
settings.nutrient_description: Heart is one of nature's richest sources of this nutrient, which is crucial for muscle growth and recovery, and essential for energy production in the muscles.

settings.title: L-Carnitine
settings.nutrient_description: Required to produce energy (ATP) in the muscles, and to protect against muscle damage. Improves sport and gym performance in elite athletes.

settings.title: Riboflavin
settings.nutrient_description: Critical for post-exercise recovery, specifically muscle pain and soreness. Also required for energy production at a cellular level.

settings.title: Choline
settings.nutrient_description: A key nutrient involved in muscle neurotransmitter synthesis.

settings.title: Glutamine
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial amino acid required to speed up muscle recovery and reduce delayed-onset muscle soreness.

settings.title: Iron
settings.nutrient_description: A critical trace mineral required for red blood cell formation and the repair of muscle tissue.

settings.title: Red Blood cells, White Blood Cells and Platelets
settings.nutrient_description: Involved in oxygen transport, the immune response, and wound healing.

settings.title: Riboflavin, Folate, B12 and Choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for red blood cell formation, as well as immune, brain, reproductive, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Heme Iron
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for brain health, energy and athletic performance, as well as immune function.

settings.title: Copper, Biotin
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for overall metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Vitamins A, D, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: In super bioavailable forms. These vitamins play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: A critical mineral for thyroid function (iodothyronine deiodinanses) and immune health/antioxidant defense (glutathione peroxidase, thioredoxin reductase).

settings.title: Splenin, Tuftsin and Splenopentin Peptides
settings.nutrient_description: Peptides found exclusively in splenic tissue which enhance immune function.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2, an antimicrobial peptide also involved in the immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Immune Proteins
settings.nutrient_description: Immunoglobulins involved in defense against viruses and bacteria.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Red and yellow bone marrow
settings.nutrient_description: Abundant in peptides, growth factors, and stem cells to promote and support the formation of red blood cells, cartilage cells (chondrocytes), bone cells (osteocytes, osteoblast & osteoclasts), and other vital tissues found throughout the body.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids including omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA
settings.nutrient_description: Play a critical role in the immune system, brain and cardiovascular health, as well as muscle recovery.

settings.title: Alkylglycerols
settings.nutrient_description: Support the immune system and formation of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets.

settings.title: Adiponectin
settings.nutrient_description: Peptide hormone shown to support immune, metabolic, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Tissue-specific proteins, hormones, growth factors, and peptides such as bovine cathelicidins
settings.nutrient_description: Show broad antimicrobial activity and are involved in the immune response.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Warrior, Lifebood, and Bone Marrow & Liver includes vital and potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: I have noticed the biggest change in my skin and joint pain in my hips. Highly recommend.
settings.author: Christine W.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: Our Exercise Performance Stack aims to boost energy, endurance, and strength during demanding workouts.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Exercise Performance Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is ideal for anyone looking for comprehensive nutritional support for optimal exercise performance.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support optimal exercise performance.
